title: President holds several rounds of discussions on current issues
body_lines: Several rounds of discussions on current issues were held under the patronage of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa this morning. President’s Media Division said.

Finance Minister Ali Sabry, Central Bank Governor Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe, State Minister Shehan Semasinghe, Secretary to the President Gamini Senarath, Principal Advisor to the President Lalith Weeratunga and Secretary to the Ministry of Finance K.M.M. Siriwardene were present at the first discussion.
Another discussion was held with the officials from the Ministries of Finance, Energy and Health.
